title: Cerebral palsy: basic abilities
creator_credit: Spastic Centre of New South Wales
brief_description: Based on the Book “Cerebral Palsy - Basic Abilities - A plan for Training the Pre-School Child” the film carefully outlines the program used in New South Wales since 1963, in an attempt to develop visuomotor and perceptual learning skills.
